Docs.summary: Registers a new default delegate which applies to all endpoints. If a delegate is already associated with the input, it will be called, else the default delegate will be called. If a default delegate was set previously, it will be overwritten. The delegate to be called when a message is sent to any input.generic parameter to be interpreted by the client code.

Generic parameter to be interpreted by the client code.
